name: Japan
interestingFact: Japan has more than 6,800 islands, though most people live on the four largest ones.

name: Brazil
interestingFact: Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest tropical rainforest in the world.

name: Canada
interestingFact: Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world, over 202,000 km.

name: Egypt
interestingFact: Egypt is home to one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World – the Great Pyramid of Giza.

name: Australia
interestingFact: Australia is the only continent that is also a country.

name: India
interestingFact: India has more than 2,000 distinct ethnic groups and over 1,600 languages.

name: Italy
interestingFact: Italy has more UNESCO World Heritage Sites than any other country in the world.

name: South Africa
interestingFact: South Africa has three capital cities: Pretoria (administrative), Cape Town (legislative), and Bloemfontein (judicial).

name: Mexico
interestingFact: Mexico is home to the world's largest pyramid by volume, the Great Pyramid of Cholula.

name: Norway
interestingFact: Norway experiences natural phenomena like the Midnight Sun in summer and the Northern Lights in winter.
